name: Leave Blackout Period
description: A Leave Blackout Period is a configurable restriction that prevents employees from submitting or approving leave requests during specific dates or date ranges — ensuring full workforce availability during critical business periods.

name: First / mother / father name in LATAM
description: Spanish name: first name, father's first surname, mother's first surname. Need to map and split for payroll (e.g. Sicoss); mother's surname optional, causing split issues when pushing to payroll.

name: Ability to hide Corporate Directory
description: Some clients don't want the Directory shown to all staff (contact details, etc.). Ability to hide the directory for employees. Changes should apply to both Web and Mobile App. Data privacy.

name: Time format throughout the system (AM/PM vs Military)
description: US clients want AM/PM time instead of military time. Should be available under localization section.

name: Annual Leave Proration & Rounding Rules
description: When annual leave is prorated, fractional entitlements (e.g. 1.15 days) cannot be granted. Client wants prorated entitlement rounded to nearest half day (except Bulgaria: nearest full day).

name: Leave accruals based on hours worked
description: Time worked (attendance/timesheets) used to generate vacation, sick leave, or lieu leave accruals. Need to define process for multi-team combined works. Ref. CA leave policies.

name: Global admin should be able to unlock any blocked user
description: Blocking for one hour causes panic and tickets; cannot remove block within an hour. Global admin should be able to remove the block to reduce unnecessary tickets. Many apps provide a way to recover.

name: LDAP logs – see whether users use LDAP or normal auth
description: When LDAP is enabled, cannot check whether it is really used. Improve logs to see whether users are using LDAP or normal authentication. Needed for troubleshooting and migration.
